summary: WHILE DRIVING W. BOUND AT ABOUT 25 MPH, PASSENGER SIDE OF CAR WAS IMPACTED BY VEHICLE GOING S. BOUND  AT ABOUT 40 MPH.  CAR WAS FORCED SW THROUGH A CURB, A GAS SIGN, AND IMPACTED WITH THE REAR OF A PARKED CAR.  ACCELERATOR WAS STUCK, BRAKES INEFFECTIVE AND FINALLY PARKED BY DRIVER.  MAJOR PASSENGER SIDE AND FRONTAL DAMAGE.  CAR TOTALED.  NEITHER PASSENGER NOR DRIVER SIDE AIR BAGS DEPLOYED.
